overview:
Clint Matthews joined the company in April 2008 as Chief Financial Officer of GrowthWorks Capital and of GrowthWorks Managed Funds. Clint is a Chartered Accountant with over 24 years of experience in accounting and financial reporting.

Prior to joining GrowthWorks, Clint served as the Vice President, Investment Finance with the Hospitals of Ontario Pension Plan for six years where he was the head of operations and finance for the plan’s $28B investment fund. Previous experience includes serving as CFO of Deutsche Bank / Securities Canada, and Gordon Capital / HSBC Securities. He worked for 9 years in public accounting at KPMG primarily serving investment dealer and foreign bank clients.
